title: Every time I open up Skyrim I find something new.
body:
A cave I never explored. A town I never visited. A quest I never did.

Sometimes, they wow me. A cool adventure.

Other times I'm cringing and praying for death.

Find Derkeethus, it's all they asked. He's in Darkwater Pass!

Where is Darkwater Pass? Who knows! No quest marker. No map marker. We're not even going to tell you the direction it's in because fuck you.
